favourite.article: Charles Fry was born in Wiltshire, England and was saved at the age of 17 in a Wesleyan Chapel, where he played the cornet. He eventually became the first bandmaster for the Salvation Army. -Songs of the Spirit by Martin ---------- The original 1st line says: Come, Thou burning Spirit, come! The original 1st line of the chorus says: Come, oh come, Great Spirit, come!
